title: Crawling Back To Me - Semitone (IIT Madras)
description: Semitone was a band we formed at IIT Madras. Crawling Back To Me was our first original. I particularly love the work we did on this one. (Wait till the end for the dual solo!)

title: Song Of Mine - Live at IITKGP Open Air Theatre
description: This one is a song about finding solace in Music. Dharani called me up one day and I still remember how we tracked the entire bass part in two takes. (The sax solo makes me very happy every single time)

title: A Saudadic Dream - For Mixed Orchestra
description: I wrote a piece for the online orchestra 'Reddit Symphony' (4:20 - 6:19). 'Saudade' is a feeling of profound longing. It's about a dream that starts with grief and resentful but ends with promises and hope.

title: Master Of Puppets, at IIT Madras Open Air Theatre
description: A day before the show we decided we'll do this, and one of the best experiences of my life. We had to recover this from multiple mobile recordings!

title: Hangar 18, in a jam room
description: We decided we have to cover a dual guitar song before my roommate from undergrad days graduated. So we covered this one

title: Standchen (Schubert), with an Online Orchestra
description: A beautiful Lieder by Schubert, arranged by Arianna. I played the Contrabasso part on an Electric Bass. We decided to keep it for the depth it added to the tone!
